quiz.title: Temperature Data Analysis - Excel Assignment
quiz.instructions:
Excel Data Analysis Quiz

Download the Excel file below and complete the required calculations. Then answer the questions in this quiz based on your analysis.

Instructions:

  1. Download the temperature data Excel file
  2. Convert all Fahrenheit temperatures to Celsius using the formula: C = (F - 32) × 5/9
  3. Convert all Celsius temperatures to Kelvin using the formula: K = C + 273.15
  4. Calculate the required statistics
  5. Answer the questions below

questions.title: Average Temperature in Celsius
questions.body:
What is the average temperature in Celsius across all 30 days? (Round to 1 decimal place)

Hint: Use the AVERAGE function in Excel

questions.title: Maximum Temperature in Kelvin
questions.body:
What is the maximum temperature in Kelvin across all 30 days? (Round to 1 decimal place)

Hint: Use the MAX function in Excel

questions.title: Standard Deviation
questions.body:
Calculate the standard deviation of temperatures in Celsius. (Round to 2 decimal places)

Hint: Use the STDEV.S or STDEV function in Excel

questions.title: Temperature Range Analysis
questions.body: Based on your analysis, which statement is TRUE about the temperature data?

questions.title: Analysis Summary
questions.body: Write a brief summary (3-5 sentences) describing the temperature trends you observed in the data. Include the minimum, maximum, and average values in your response.
